(479x243+211)/64 mod 1024 = 798. (479x243+211)/128 mod 512 = 399. (479x729+761)/256 mod 256 = 87. (479x2187+2539)/512 mod 128 = 3. (479x6561+8129)/1024 mod 64 = 5. (479x19683+25411)/2048 mod 32 = 8. (479x19683+25411)/4096 mod 16 = 4. (479x19683+25411)/8192 mod 8 = 2. (479x19683+25411)/16384 mod 4 = 1. (479x59049+92617)/32768 mod 2 = 0. (479x59049+92617)/65536 mod 1 = 0.
